nunchitap.rules: Place phone in the center. Tap the screen in order from 1 to the number of players. If two people tap at the same time, they DRINK!

bomb31.rules: Take turns tapping 1, 2, or 3 times to advance the counter. The person who taps '31' explodes and DRINKS!

vibevote.rules: Read the prompt out loud. On the count of 3, everyone points to the person who fits it best. The person with the most votes spins the consequence wheel!
prompts: Who is most likely to text their ex tonight?
Who has the worst taste in music?
Who would die first in a horror movie?
Who is most likely to get arrested for a stupid reason?
Who spends the most time on TikTok?
Who has the wildest dating history?
Who is most likely to become a millionaire by accident?
Who is secretly judging everyone right now?
Who is most likely to fake sick to get out of plans?
